data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 12 believers in Hiiraan, Somalia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hiiraan, Somalia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 12 believers living in the state of Hiiraan. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6841 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Hiiraan to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, please defend the 12 believers in Hiiraan against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mahra people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 12 believers in Hiiraan, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Hiiraan, Somalia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hiiraan, Somalia has a population of 82,100.

We estimate Hiiraan has 12 people who might know Jesus, 235 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 81,854 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,841 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Hiiraan, Somalia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Hiiraan
location.people_groups_list: Somali Bantu, Oromo, Southern, Arab, Omani, Somali, Rahanweyn
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Somali Bantu (769,000), Oromo, Southern (88,000), Arab, Omani (90,000), Somali (12,075,000), Rahanweyn (2,016,000)
